pr_title: [CAMEL-15024] Add support for ZonedDateTime in camel-bindy

timeline.body: Please run the build with the profile sourcecheck enable and fix the warnings you'll see
timeline.bodyText: Please run the build with the profile sourcecheck enable and fix the warnings you'll see
timeline.bodyHTML: Please run the build with the profile sourcecheck enable and fix the warnings you'll see
timeline.author: oscerd

timeline.message: [CAMEL-15024] Add support for ZonedDateTime after codestyle fixes

timeline.body: Is it intentional to comment out the string param here?
timeline.bodyText: Is it intentional to comment out the string param here?
timeline.bodyHTML: Is it intentional to comment out the string param here?
timeline.author: omarsmak

timeline.body:
I'd change this to initialize `date` directly unless there was another reason perhaps?:
```suggestion
            ZonedDateTime date = ZonedDateTime.parse(string, df);
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
I'd change this to initialize date directly unless there was another reason perhaps?:

Suggested change
date = ZonedDateTime.parse(string, df);
ZonedDateTime date = ZonedDateTime.parse(string, df);
timeline.author: omarsmak
